snippet: Prosecutors, who called the sentence “shockingly light," have said Mr. Pistorius should have been found guilty of murder for killing his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp, in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors, who called the sentence “shockingly light," have said Mr. Pistorius should have been found guilty of murder for killing his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp, in 2013.

headline.main: South Africa: Pistorius Appeal Hearing Set for Dec. 9
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Pistorius Appeal Hearing Set for Dec. 9
